file_content.text: Viridian Squad's a bunch of blasted heroes. So are you.
Your scouts were captured by Massassi. I freed the survivors. Their commander left a message.
Sergeant Jung, dead. Blast it. I'll put her in for a commendation along with her men.
You did good. You and Jung both. We'll get a report from the team and get the injured off-planet... and try to keep this from happening again.
Viridian Squad hasn't reported in. They were scouting the Massassi village.
